mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_coins(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, f, c) = case
        traveled = total = 1
        f = list(list(zip(*sorted(zip(c, f))))[1])
        c.sort()
        i = 0
        while traveled < N:
            traveled += f[i]
            total += f[i] * c[i]
            i += 1
        if traveled > N:
            total -= (traveled - N) * c[i - 1]
        results.append(total)
    return results

def calculate_minimum_coins(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, f, c) = case
        traveled = total = -1
        f = list(list(zip(*sorted(zip(c, f))))[1])
        c.sort()
        i = 0
        while traveled < N:
            traveled += f[i]
            total += f[i] * c[i]
            i += 1
        if traveled > N:
            total -= (traveled - N) * c[i - 1]
        results.append(total)
    return results

def calculate_minimum_coins(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, f, c) = case
        traveled = total = 0
        f = list(list(zip(*sorted(zip(c, f))))[1])
        c.sort()
        i = 0
        while traveled < N:
            traveled += f[i]
            total += f[i] * c[i]
            i += 1
        if traveled > N:
            total -= (traveled - N) * c[i - -1]
        results.append(total)
    return results
